content.rendered:
[vc_row content_placement=”middle”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”1484″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Headquartered in Bengaluru, India’s IT capital, Our client is a fast–growing conglomerate engaged in diverse businesses, including Information Systems and Technology, Electronics, Infrastructure Development, Hospitality, Renewable Energies and Sustainability.

With a global workforce spread across three continents, our client believes in the power of vertical integration and delivers competitive solutions to customers worldwide.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”dft-spacer”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Challenges faced by the Client

  • Our client sought to digitize their Human Resources Management System and streamline operations by eliminating manual processes and physical storage of employee records. Additionally, they aimed to implement a cloud-based application for seamless web and mobile connectivity, integrate standalone CRM systems into one enterprise suite, and provide a unified interface for management and their global workforce.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Solutions provided by Dreams Technologies

  • Dreamguys Technologies provided an extensive range of software applications through the deployment of their NewHRMS.com web and mobile application platform, complemented by custom modules tailored to meet our client’s requirements.
  • The NewHrms.com system was securely deployed on AWS cloud infrastructure, guaranteeing both high availability and scalability.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”dft-spacer greybg”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Technologies Used

[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_raw_html]JTNDZGl2JTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjJzZWN0aW9uLWhlYWRlci1pbmZvJTIwdGV4dC1jZW50ZXIlMjIlM0UlMEElMjAlMjAlMjAlMjAlM0NoMiUyMGNsYXNzJTNEJTIybWItMCUyMiUzRUNhc2UlMjBTdHVkaWVzJTNDc3BhbiUzRUNhc2UlMjBTdHVkaWVzJTNDJTJGc3BhbiUzRSUzQyUyRmgyJTNFJTBBJTNDJTJGZGl2JTNF[/vc_raw_html][vc_basic_grid post_type=”casestudies” max_items=”3″ grid_id=”vc_gid:1744028764226-438d5e75-d80d-0″ el_class=”rec-blg-posts all-case-studies”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row]
